I Specialize In

HTML5

Build website's contents with the lastest version of markup language, HTML5.

CSS3

Create website's presentation with the lastest version of CSS, CSS3. Using CSS preprocessor(SASS) and Bootstrap 4 framework to speed up coding.

JAVASCRIPT

Build website's behavior with the lastest version of JS, ES6. Using Jquery library and ReactJS (still learning) to speed up coding.

My Coding Process

Define problem

Identify problem and create a to-do-list.

Pre-coding

Thinking about the way to solve an identified problem, create a architecture to structure the code.

Coding

Start to code the app, website base on the architecture, try to write clean code.

Testing & Fix Bugs

Run the app, find bugs and fix them.
